## Rules

| Type                | Rule                                                                  |
| ------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Purpose**         | Transform text formatted with supported Markdown tags into components |
| **Differentiation** | -                                                                     |
| **Quantity**        | -                                                                     |
| **Behavior**        | -                                                                     |
| **Combination**     | -                                                                     |
